p: Specific humidity and a drop in temperature have been suggested as the key drivers in triggering seasonal influenza epidemics ( Lowen et al., 2008; Shaman et al., 2010). These initial conclusions were drawn from experiments conducted using an animal model (guinea pig), under controlled laboratory conditions ( Lowen et al., 2008), followed by indirect support from epidemiological modeling ( Shaman et al., 2010).
